00274     void print(  std::ostream& os) {
00275       os << " board: " << BoardID(getBoardID()) 
00276          << " Record Label=" << getRecordLabel()
00277          << " enabled mask=" << std::hex << getInputEnableMask()
00278          << " osc. enable=" << getOscillatorEnable()
00279          << " general enable=" << getGeneralEnable()
00280          << " osc. period=" << getOscillationPeriod()
00281          << " burst counter=" << getBurstCounter()
00282          << " configuration=" << getConfiguration()
00283          << " fifo idle depth=" << getFifoIdleDepth()
00284          << " Busy Timeout=" << getBusyTimeout()
00285          << " Burst Timeout=" << getBurstTimeout()
00286          << " and Enable 0=" << getAndEnable(0)
00287          << " and Enable 1=" << getAndEnable(1)
00288          << " and Enable 2=" << getAndEnable(2)
00289          << " and Enable 3=" << getAndEnable(3)
00290          << " ext Beammode=" << getExtBeamMode()
00291          << " Input Invert=" << getInputInvert()
00292          << " QDR Configuration=" << getQdrConfiguration()
00293          << " Sequencer Control=" << getSequencerControl()
00294          << std::endl;
00295     };
